trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli would send you to play with the alpacas.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja and mount a punutiy.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_TODO_01<tab>Mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the alpacas.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Yubli.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_000_000<tab>One of our alpaca handlers has taken his charges down by the water for some play time. Miisul Ja, however, thinks that they shouldn't have all the fun to themselves.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_000_001<tab>She tells me the punutiys are looking on with envy, and is keen to give the animals a chance to sniff each other over. Both sides are incurably curious creatures, so I think it a worthwhile endeavor.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_100_001<tab>As you've proven well-liked by all manner of beasts, I would like you to be present to help facilitate. Should the prospect interest you, head over to the punutiy pen and speak with Miisul Ja.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERALPACA05226_100_001<tab>Mrnnn, mrnnn!
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_110_001<tab>The alpacas are eager to frolic in the water─we're just waiting on the punutiy.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_MIISULJA_000_002<tab>Ah, I thought Yubli might send you. As you've probably heard, I want to give the punutiys and the alpacas a chance to meet each other.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_MIISULJA_000_003<tab>This old beastkeeper has seen your natural rapport with the animals, so it makes sense that you should be there to oversee proceedings.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_MIISULJA_100_003<tab>All you really need to do, though, is ride over and have the punutiy perform her water trick. The alpacas will love it! I'll be here in case you hop off and lose your mount before you're done.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_MIISULJA_110_003<tab>Yes, yes, your punutiy is here. Mount up and off you go!
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERALPACA05226_000_004<tab>Mrn?
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERALPACA05226_000_005<tab>Mrrrn, mrrrn!♪
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_000_006<tab>Miisul Ja roped you in for this animal meet and greet, did she? I think it's a fine idea.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_000_007<tab>I've heard that the magical spray of the punutiy's water conjuration works to dispel unwelcome heat. As such, I wanted the alpacas to bathe in it for their well-being as much as for their enjoyment.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_000_008<tab>And they certainly enjoyed it, from what I can see. Having them play together like this on a regular basis will go far towards keeping them healthy and content.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERALPACA05226_000_009<tab>Mrnnn, mrnnn!
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The alpacas appear eager to begin their playtime. Speak with Miisul Ja at Dock Poga to mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the waiting animals.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_000_011<tab>The alpacas are eager to frolic in the water─we're just waiting on the punutiy.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja at Dock Poga to mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the waiting alpacas.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERALPACA05226_000_013<tab>Mrrrn, mrrrn!♪
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>The alpacas are frolicking happily after bathing in the punutiy's watery display.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_WATERPELUPELUL05226_000_015<tab>Thank you for bringing the animals together! After that refreshing shower, the alpacas are more lively than ever!
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_MIISULJA_100_015<tab>If punutiys could be said to grin, I'd say she enjoyed herself immensely! Hopefully we can organize another playdate with the alpacas soon.
TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_000_016<tab>The way punutiys behave around those they wish to be close with, you can sense an undercurrent of caring in their actions.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_000_017<tab>The fact that their stunning water display has the added effect of magically cooling others down, and thus making life in this humid land more tolerable, it's... Well, it's just fascinating.

TEXT_BANPEL128_05226_YUBLI_100_017<tab>We have much to learn from these acts of caring, and can use those lessons to improve our customers' experience. Such business aside, I must thank you again for helping to make this precious interaction happen!
